mapper.select: SELECT A.icategory, A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.rdt, A.hits, B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg FROM t_board A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.icategory = ${icategory} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board(icategory, title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (${icategory}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, ${iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser, A.lastip, A.ctnt,A.title, A.rdt, A.hits, A.icategory, B.nm as writernm, C.nm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN t_board_category C ON A.icategory = C.icategory WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.iboard = ${iboard}
